hints.content:
The number line shows $\maroonD{8}$ equal jumps of $\blueD{4}$ units.

![The same number line with each arrow labeled, plus 4](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ac6845e1adfe8ea211fdaf6e8d6846ad7184912a)

options.explanation:
$\maroonD{8}\times\blueD{4}=\maroonD{8}\blueD{\text{ fours}}$.

That's the same as $\maroonD{4}\blueD{\text{ fours}}+\maroonD{4}\blueD{\text{ fours}}$.

![The same number line with a brace spanning the first 4 arrows labeled, 4 fours, and a brace spanning the other 4 arrows labeled, 4 fours](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7accac7e0fdd7d0caf43ea55d213d5ce6cc3b949)

$\redD{16}+\purpleC{16}=\greenD{32}$

So $\maroonD{8}\times\blueD{4}=\greenD{32}$.

question.content:
**Multiply.**  
*Hint: Use the number line below to help solve the equation.*
